thread.title: “Multifaceted queen” – Caitlin Clark cannot stop surprising fans as high school clip of superstar acing on soccer pitch goes viral
thread.title_full: “Multifaceted queen” – Caitlin Clark cannot stop surprising fans as high school clip of superstar acing on soccer pitch goes viral

author: Saiel Lad
title: “Multifaceted queen” – Caitlin Clark cannot stop surprising fans as high school clip of superstar acing on soccer pitch goes viral
text:
“Multifaceted queen” – Caitlin Clark cannot stop surprising fans as high school clip of superstar acing on soccer pitch goes viral
Indiana Fever rookie star Caitlin Clark played soccer for the Dowling Catholic high school in Iowa and was one of the top soccer players.
Caitlin Clark playing soccer (image via NBA)
Indiana Fever rookie Caitlin Clark has made her impact in the WNBA as one of the best rookie stars the league has ever seen. Throughout the season, Clark has displayed her excellence on the court with elite playmaking and shooting skills. Clark even led the Fever to their first playoffs appearance since 2016. In addition to her basketball prowess, many fans might not realize that Clark is a multi-talented athlete who has also explored other sports.
Recently, one of
Caitlin Clark‘s fan pages posted a video on social media showing the Fever rookie playing soccer. The video surprised many WNBA fans who were unaware of Clark’s involvement in other sports. In the video, fans watched Clark receive a good pass from her teammate and then score an outstanding goal.
During her high school days, Clark played soccer for Dowling Catholic high school in Iowa. According to another post, Clark was also named to the All-State First team and was the only freshman to do it. In just six games, the Indiana rookie managed to score 26 goals.
Clark missed many games of her soccer season because she was focused on winning the gold medal for Team USA in the U-16 FIBA Americas Championship.
Many of Clark’s soccer coaches have praised her soccer stint. However, once Caitlin became a sophomore, she drastically improved her basketball game. Clark went on to become the first overall pick in the 2024 WNBA draft and has since been
breaking records and setting new milestones.
Fans react to Caitlin Clark’s old soccer video
Caitlin Clark’s soccer video is creating a lot of buzz on social media. Fans are surprised by Clark’s soccer skills. Despite her short soccer stint, Clark still managed to become one of the top soccer stars during her high school days.
After her video went viral over social media fans had a wide spectrum of reactions filled with shock and surprise. Many fans even called her “Multifaceted queen” after watching her high school soccer clips.
Despite almost six years of playing soccer, Clark has become one of the biggest young stars in the WNBA. She started her WNBA career with an
impressive rookie season and is a top contender for Rookie of the Year, especially with Angel Reese out for the season due to injury.
Clark’s soccer skills have definitely aided her in making quick decisions on the basketball court. Fans will be waiting to see how her career fares in the league.
